verses.verse: Now Jericho <WH3405> was straitly shut up <WH5462> <WH5462> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> none <WH369> went out, <WH3318> and none <WH369> came in. <WH935>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> See, <WH7200> I have given <WH5414> into thine hand <WH3027> <WH853> Jericho, <WH3405> and the king <WH4428> thereof, and the mighty <WH1368> men of valor. <WH2428>

And ye shall compass <WH5437> <WH853> the city, <WH5892> all <WH3605> ye men <WH376> of war, <WH4421> and go round about <WH5362> <WH853> the city <WH5892> once. <WH259> <WH6471> Thus <WH3541> shalt thou do <WH6213> six <WH8337> days. <WH3117>

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> shall bear <WH5375> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns: <WH3104> and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall compass <WH5437> <WH853> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times, <WH6471> and the priests <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> that when they make a long blast <WH4900> with the ram's <WH3104> horn, <WH7161> and when ye hear <WH8085> <WH853> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> shall shout <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout; <WH8643> and the wall <WH2346> of the city <WH5892> shall fall down <WH5307> flat, <WH8478> and the people <WH5971> shall ascend up <WH5927> every man <WH376> straight before <WH5048> him.

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> called <WH7121> <WH413> the priests, <WH3548> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Take up <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant, <WH1285> and let <WH5375> seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bear <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> Pass on, <WH5674> and compass <WH5437> <WH853> the city, <WH5892> and let him that is armed <WH2502> pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Joshua <WH3091> had spoken <WH559> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> that the seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> passed on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> followed <WH1980> <WH310> them.

And the armed men <WH2502> went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the priests <WH3548> that blew <WH8628> with the trumpets, <WH7782> and the rearward <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark, <WH727> the priests going on, <WH1980> and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>

And Joshua <WH3091> had commanded <WH6680> the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Ye shall not <WH3808> shout, <WH7321> nor <WH3808> make any noise <WH8085> with <WH854> your voice, <WH6963> neither <WH3808> shall any word <WH1697> proceed out <WH3318> of your mouth, <WH4480> <WH6310> until <WH5704> the day <WH3117> I bid <WH559> you shout; <WH7321> then shall ye shout. <WH7321>

So the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> compassed <WH5437> <WH853> the city, <WH5892> going about <WH5362> it once: <WH259> <WH6471> and they came <WH935> into the camp, <WH4264> and lodged <WH3885> in the camp. <WH4264>
And Joshua <WH3091> rose early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and the priests <WH3548> took up <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> went on continually, <WH1980> <WH1980> and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and the armed men <WH2502> went <WH1980> before <WH6440> them; but the rearward <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> the priests going on, <WH1980> and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets. <WH7782>

And the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> <WH853> the city <WH5892> once, <WH259> <WH6471> and returned <WH7725> into the camp: <WH4264> so <WH3541> they did <WH6213> six <WH8337> days. <WH3117>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the seventh <WH7637> day, <WH3117> that they rose early <WH7925> about the dawning <WH5927> of the day, <WH7837> and compassed <WH5437> <WH853> the city <WH5892> after the same <WH2088> manner <WH4941> seven <WH7651> times: <WH6471> only <WH7535> on that <WH2088> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> <WH853> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times. <WH6471>

And it came to pass <WH1961> at the seventh <WH7637> time, <WH6471> when the priests <WH3548> blew <WH8628> with the trumpets, <WH7782> Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> Shout; <WH7321> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> you <WH853> the city. <WH5892>

And the city <WH5892> shall be <WH1961> accursed, <WH2764> even it, <WH1931> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> are therein, to the LORD: <WH3068> only <WH7535> Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> shall live, <WH2421> she <WH1931> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> are with <WH854> her in the house, <WH1004> because <WH3588> she hid <WH2244> <WH853> the messengers <WH4397> that <WH834> we sent. <WH7971>

And ye, <WH859> in any wise <WH7357> keep <WH8104> yourselves from <WH4480> the accursed thing, <WH2764> lest <WH6435> ye make yourselves accursed, <WH2763> when ye take <WH3947> of <WH4480> the accursed thing, <WH2764> and make <WH7760> <WH853> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478> a curse, <WH2764> and trouble <WH5916> it.

But all <WH3605> the silver, <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> and vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and iron, <WH1270> are consecrated <WH6944> unto the LORD: <WH3068> they shall come <WH935> into the treasury <WH214> of the LORD. <WH3068>

So the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> when the priests blew <WH8628> with the trumpets: <WH7782> and it came to pass, <WH1961> when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> and the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout, <WH8643> that the wall <WH2346> fell down <WH5307> flat, <WH8478> so that the people <WH5971> went up <WH5927> into the city, <WH5892> every man <WH376> straight before <WH5048> him, and they took <WH3920> <WH853> the city. <WH5892>

And they utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> was in the city, <WH5892> both man <WH4480> <WH376> and woman, <WH802> young <WH4480> <WH5288> and old, <WH2205> and ox, <WH7794> and sheep, <WH7716> and ass, <WH2543> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword. <WH2719>

But Joshua <WH3091> had said <WH559> unto the two <WH8147> men <WH376> that had spied out <WH7270> <WH853> the country, <WH776> Go into <WH935> the harlot's <WH802> <WH2181> house, <WH1004> and bring out <WH3318> thence <WH4480> <WH8033> <WH853> the woman, <WH802> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> she hath, as <WH834> ye swore <WH7650> unto her.

And the young men <WH5288> that were spies <WH7270> went in, <WH935> and brought out <WH3318> <WH853> Rahab, <WH7343> and her father, <WH1> and her mother, <WH517> and her brethren, <WH251> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> she had; and they brought out <WH3318> all <WH3605> her kindred, <WH4940> and left <WH5117> them without <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> of Israel. <WH3478>

And they burnt <WH8313> the city <WH5892> with fire, <WH784> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> was therein: only <WH7535> the silver, <WH3701> and the gold, <WH2091> and the vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and of iron, <WH1270> they put <WH5414> into the treasury <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And Joshua <WH3091> saved <WH2421> Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> alive, and her father's <WH1> household, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> she had; and she dwelleth <WH3427> in <WH7130> Israel <WH3478> even unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day; <WH3117> because <WH3588> she hid <WH2244> <WH853> the messengers, <WH4397> which <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH7270> <WH853> Jericho. <WH3405>

And Joshua <WH3091> adjured <WH7650> them at that <WH1931> time, <WH6256> saying, <WH559> Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> that <WH834> riseth up <WH6965> and buildeth <WH1129> <WH853> this <WH2063> city <WH5892> <WH853> Jericho: <WH3405> he shall lay the foundation <WH3245> thereof in his firstborn, <WH1060> and in his youngest <WH6810> son shall he set up <WH5324> the gates <WH1817> of it.
So the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> with <WH854> Joshua; <WH3091> and his fame <WH8089> was <WH1961> noised throughout all <WH3605> the country. <WH776>
